data.title: List of Hamilton and the Harlots episodes
data.meta_description: Hamilton and the Harlots is an American sitcom created by Emma Candace, and produced by Cowlip Productions, Buena Vista Television, Mibao Information Technology, Ltd.. In total, there we're 102 episodes, aired from 1997 to 2003. The series stars Robert Smigel as the eponymous character, Gregory...
data.text:
Hamilton and the Harlots is an American sitcom created by Emma Candace, and produced by Cowlip Productions, Buena Vista Television, Mibao Information Technology, Ltd.. In total, there we're 102 episodes, aired from 1997 to 2003. The series stars Robert Smigel as the eponymous character, Gregory Hamilton. In the first season, Gregory plans his big return to celebrity relevance with a tell-all autobiography that he dictates to ghostwriter Maureen Hamilton (Lar Park Lincoln), Gregory also has to contend with the demands of his agent and on-again-off-again girlfriend, Madelyn Hamilton (Madeleine Stowe), the misguided antics of his freeloading roommate Donald Hamilton (Brian Benben); and his frenemy, Bob Hamilton (Jerry Seinfeld), who also undergoes a tumultuous long-term relationship with Maureen.

On September 21, 2003, Xtranormal Network cancelled the series after seven seasons.

Series overview[]
